Sentencas: Hydrogen represents the most conventional fuel to feed Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) for green energy production.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: However, hydrogen has some drawbacks which prevent the large-scale implementation.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Research identified ammonia as promising hydrogen vector.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Hereby, highly dispersed Ni nanoparticle are deposited on La-doped strontium titanate by exsolution, greatly affecting the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The exsolved Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate (La0.45Sr0.45Ti0.90Ni0.10-dO(3) - LSTNOH) was largely characterized.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: XRD analysis detected 10 mol% of Ni doping has been successfully incorporated in to the perovskite structure and then released when exposed in reducing environment.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: SEM images show Ni nanoparticles highly dispersed on the surface.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: XPS confirms the presence of Ni on the surface after the exsolution and allows to exclude other detrimental diffusion towards the bulk.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A LSTNOH derived composite based anode has been investigated through impedance spectroscopy using ammonia and hydrogen as fuel.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It demonstrates best per-formances compared to the one obtained by Ni infiltration on LSTO (La0.45Sr0.45TiO3) composite scaffold.
Titulo: Exsolution in Ni-doped lanthanum strontium titanate: a perovskite-based material for anode application in ammonia-fed Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Polarization resistance, running on ammonia, decreases raising the temperature and the performances approach those in hydrogen.
